Text: garbage. Comes in a million different rar files that are impossible to combine, with absolutely no instructions on patching.
This is garbage Stun - what is the source so that we can obtain a good download without all of this other crap.

This works, you have to unzip all zips then move resulting rar files out of their individual directories all into same directory so that when you double click lightroom_3_ls11.part01.rar it extracts properly

Pain though :D
